section_text: 1 1 The Secretary of State shall lay before Parliament each financial year a register of organisations listed in the Schedule to this Act, these being publicly-financed international parliamentary organisations which are in receipt of an annual grant-in-aid to fund both British and international secretariats and which draw their membership from both Houses of Parliament. 2 The register shall include the following— a the name of the organisation; and b the amount of money allocated to that organisation in that financial year.
2 This Act may be cited as the International Parliamentary Organisations (Registration) Act 1989.
